meta_title: Ella Fitzgerald - What Are You Doing New Year’s Eve? (Lyric Video)
meta_description: Enjoy the classic holiday tune "What Are You Doing New Year’s Eve?" by Ella Fitzgerald.
meta_keywords: Ella Fitzgerald, New Year’s Eve, Holiday Music, Vocal Jazz, Christmas Songs, Classic Christmas, Christmas Jazz, Lyric Video
new_description:
About the Video

This lyrical video of “What Are You Doing New Year’s Eve?” features the incomparable Ella Fitzgerald and adds a visual delight to the classic holiday tune. The song is part of the cherished album, "Ella Wishes You A Swinging Christmas,” which has enchanted listeners since its release. Directed by Tom Readdy and Lucy Dawkins at Yes Please Productions, this video captures the evergreen appeal of Ella Fitzgerald's voice, paired with charming animations that breathe life into the festive spirit of the song.

The Charm of Ella Fitzgerald

Ella Fitzgerald, often referred to as the First Lady of Song, remains one of the most beloved voices in jazz. With a career spanning over six decades, her ability to interpret and breathe new life into songs is unmatched. Through her collaboration with some of the best musicians and producers, Ella has left a legacy that continues to influence artists across genres. Her rendition of “What Are You Doing New Year’s Eve?” is a testament to her timeless appeal and sophisticated style.

The Album: Ella Wishes You A Swinging Christmas

The album "Ella Wishes You A Swinging Christmas” was released in 1960 and has since become an essential part of many holiday music collections. The album features an array of well-loved Christmas songs and showcases Ella's versatility and talent in bringing warmth and joy to traditional festive tunes. Tracks such as “Jingle Bells,” “Sleigh Ride,” and “Frosty the Snowman” have been celebrated for their lively arrangements and Ella's joyful exuberance.

Visual Craftsmanship

The lyric video directed by Tom Readdy and Lucy Dawkins reflects a deep understanding of the song's nostalgic and romantic essence. The illustrations and animations in the video are not only captivating but align beautifully with the timeless feel of the music. Joanna Davidovich, who designed the Ella Fitzgerald character, has brought a whimsical yet sophisticated touch to the visuals, accentuating the festive and contemplative nature of the song.

A Timeless Classic for Modern Times

This beautiful lyric video provides both a contemporary and classic experience. It serves as both a reminder of Ella Fitzgerald’s incredible legacy and a fresh introduction for a new generation of listeners. By blending vibrant animations with the magical sound of Ella's voice, this video ensures that “What Are You Doing New Year’s Eve?” remains an integral part of holiday traditions for years to come.

Explore More

For fans who want to delve deeper into the music of Ella Fitzgerald and the Christmas spirit, Verve has curated the "Verve Wishes You A Swinging Christmas” playlist as well as a collection of classic Christmas music videos. These collections offer a treasure trove of songs that capture the festive cheer and the rich tradition of vocal jazz.

Connect and Listen

Stay connected with Ella Fitzgerald's enduring musical journey on her social media channels and streaming services. Her timeless recordings are available for streaming on Apple Music, Spotify, Amazon Music, Tidal, Deezer, and YouTube Music. Engaging with these platforms ensures that her legendary music continues to enchant and inspire audiences around the world.

Conclusion

Ella Fitzgerald's “What Are You Doing New Year’s Eve?” remains a perennial favorite during the holiday season. The combination of Ella's unforgettable voice, festive melodies, and endearing lyrics creates a perfect blend of nostalgia and joy. As you enjoy this lyric video, let the magic of Ella's music fill your space with warmth and holiday cheer, making New Year's Eve a moment to cherish and remember.
